meta.description: Optimize the number of cows and elephants used to transport bricks with constraints on their numbers and carrying capacity.

sets.name: ANIMALS
sets.description: Types of animals used for transporting bricks.

params.name: carrying_capacity
params.description: Carrying capacity of each type of animal in bricks.

vars.name: num_animals
vars.description: Number of each type of animal used.

objective.name: min_total_animals
objective.description: Minimize the total number of animals used.

constraints.name: transport_capacity
constraints.description: Ensure at least 1000 bricks are transported.

constraints.name: elephant_cow_ratio_max
constraints.description: The number of elephants cannot exceed the number of cows.

constraints.name: cow_elephant_ratio_max
constraints.description: There can be at most twice the number of cows as elephants.
